page.title: 03Grimsby District Hospital.
page.content: Work was commenced on building the new {Grimsby District General Hospital}in {1974.}It was built on a{90}acre site adjacent to the existing{Scartho Road {Hospital.}The new hospital was intended to replace{two}old hospitals, the{Grimsby General Hospital,}which was in the{West Marsh}area of{Grimsby, and was built in{1877,}and the {Springfield Hospital.}The estimated construction cost was{Â£10 500 000}and it was expected to be completed in {l978. In actual fact the hospital was not completed until{l983}and the final construction cost was{Â£24 000 000. The hospital serves a local {population}area in excess of{250 000. It has{530}beds. The{accident and {emergency department}at the hospital treats{45 000 patients}each year. This is an average of{865 patients per day.
